Instead, what has happened? Inflation has gone not down but up. Gas  prices were 2 percent up from the previous month. Chicken, pork, beef-- all more expensive. Eggs, 15 percent higher than last month.

Mrs. FISCHBACH. Mr. Speaker, I rise to congratulate Mr. Dave Preisler  on receiving the Minnesota Pork Board's Distinguished Service Award.

The State of Iowa leads the Nation in corn, pork, and soybean  production. Expanding access to international markets is essential for  our rural communities to succeed.
